domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies

text: @cynoptimist I believe in vaccination and you have brought up a really important complication of any flu. I think both flu & pneumonia vaccine should not be overlooked. Thanks for getting this out there.
